testimonials.title: Loved by Goal Achievers
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands who have transformed their habits with FitNudge

sarah.name: Sarah M.
sarah.content: FitNudge completely changed how I approach my goals. The AI check-ins feel personal and actually motivate me to stay consistent.

david.name: David R.
david.content: The weekly recaps are amazing! I love seeing my patterns - it shows me what's working, and where I need to improve. Game changer for my training.

emily.name: Emily T.
emily.content: As a busy mom, I never thought I could stay consistent with my goals. The smart reminders and celebration of small wins keep me going.

alex.name: Alex P.
alex.content: I've tried many habit trackers but FitNudge is different. The AI actually remembered why I started and uses that to motivate me.

jessica.name: Jessica L.
jessica.content: The accountability partner feature is brilliant! Having someone to share my journey with makes all the difference.

michael.name: Michael K.
michael.content: Down 30 lbs in 6 months! The streak tracking kept me accountable even on days I didn't feel like working out.

health.title: Platform Availability
health.tagline: Live view of our core infrastructure. Every bar below represents the last recorded health check. Green means healthy, amber indicates partial degradation, and red points to a service disruption.

how_we_track.title: How we track status
how_we_track.description: Every minute we run automated checks across critical infrastructure. Hereâ€™s what we monitor:

items.api: API heartbeat, database reachability, cache connections.

components_section.title: Component Health

hero.title: About FitNudge
hero.subtitle: We're building the future of habit formation through AI-powered accountability and personalized motivation.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Born from a simple idea: what if you had an accountability partner that never slept and always knew exactly what to say?
story.description: It's easy to lose focus and motivation when building new habits. We've all been there - starting the year with ambitious goals, only to find ourselves giving up by February. Whether it's working out, reading more, learning a new skill, or any other positive habit, staying consistent is hard. That's where FitNudge came about. We realized that what people really need isn't another tracking app or todo list - they need an accountability partner who understands them, believes in them, and is there 24/7 to keep them on track. So we set out to build an AI-powered coach that never sleeps, never judges, and always knows exactly what to say to keep you motivated on your journey to becoming your best self.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We believe everyone deserves a personal accountability partner that understands their journey and keeps them motivated.

consistency.title: Consistency First
consistency.description: We focus on helping users build lasting habits through daily check-ins, streaks, and personalized motivation.

ai.title: AI-Powered Coaching
ai.description: Our AI coach learns from your progress and adapts its motivation style to keep you engaged and accountable.

community.title: Accountability Partners
community.description: Connect with partners who share your goals. Motivate each other with cheers and nudges.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do at FitNudge.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. We never share your personal information without consent.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in the power of accountability partners and peer motivation to achieve any goal.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide the most effective AI-powered accountability experience.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand that building habits has ups and downs, and we're here to support you through both.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate people behind FitNudge, working to make accountability accessible to everyone.

founder.name: Alex Johnson
founder.bio: Habit enthusiast and AI researcher with 10+ years in tech. Passionate about making personal growth accessible to everyone.

cto.name: Sarah Chen
cto.bio: Full-stack engineer and AI specialist. Leads our technical team in building scalable, intelligent solutions.

designer.name: Mike Rodriguez
designer.bio: UX/UI designer focused on creating intuitive, engaging experiences that motivate users to achieve their goals.

reset_password.need_help: Need help? Contact support and we'll get you back in quickly.
reset_password.title: Reset Your Password
reset_password.download_prompt: Download the app to reset your password
reset_password.no_app_installed: Do not have the app installed?
reset_password.manual_instructions: If the app did not open automatically, open the FitNudge app and use "Forgot password" to request a fresh link. Your reset code from this link has already been applied inside the app if it opened successfully.
reset_password.security_note: Password reset links expire in 1 hour for your security. If you did not request a reset, you can safely ignore this email.
reset_password.validation_error_missing: This password reset link is invalid or missing a token. Please request a new reset email.
reset_password.validation_error_expired: This password reset link is no longer valid. Please request a new reset email.
reset_password.validation_error_network: We couldn't verify this reset link right now. Please request a new password reset email.
